name: Parado Hill Racing Advance
description:
Parado Hill Racing Advance is being presented for extreme racing, persistent freeride, speeding and smashing in the hill station and toughest top of the hill and mountain. Racers and riders must get ready to cross all obstacles and hurdles in their way towards hill climbing and speed racing.

Features:
4x4 Luxury Prado to drive in real simulated environment.
Racing adventure with a highly tuned 4x4 SUV Vehicle.
Multiple missions to accomplish in this adventurous driving game.
Location map is available to guide the cruiser to its destination.
